item.title: Need Help (kinda New)
item.dc:creator: @Nightz Nightz
item.description:
@Nightz wrote:

No-ip Tut==

  1. Go to whatismyip.com and copy your ip

  2. when the login comes up put admin username and pass 1234

  3. go to Games and applications

  4. add an port to it…(any name) FTP or both.

  5. Continue / save whatever it saids…

  6. go to no-ip.com

  7. make an account (if you havent)

  8. Go to management and find “Add ip” or something like that

  9. Make any name ip that you want!

  10. Save it and am your done!

Save >> Done >> You have no-ip!

Hamachi…

  1. Go to hamachi.cc and download latest…

  2. when you open it go to the bottom right of it and click the first one next to the botton on the corner

  3. Create Hamachi server… >>NAME <=> >>PASSWORD 123 (recommended)

  4. look on top and there will be an ip…its hard to miss

Use that ip and post it to your Advrisement fourms lol on moparscape fourms

Bam your done…

SOURCE!

Go to your source and click Run.bat and it should start without errors

if you get an error download latest java at java.com…

Read full topic
